title: Where It Began
body: Starting with domain lists and work tasks. Who knew that checking links together would be the start of us?

title: Working Side by Side
body: Checking 500px and Scribd together. Even work feels like a shared adventure when I'm doing it with you.

title: The First Check-In
body: Making sure we didn't miss anything in the sequence. You always keep me on track.

title: Midnight Thoughts
body: The quiet hours when the rest of the world fades away and it's just our messages lighting up the screen.

title: A Small Care
body: Asking if you've eaten or if you're tired. It’s the little things that show how much you mean to me.

title: The Balcony View
body: Standing on the balcony, thinking of you. The world looks better when I'm sharing my thoughts with you.

title: Late Night Smiles
body: When a simple 'Hello' from you is enough to change the entire mood of my night.

title: The Promise of Care
body: 'Apna khayal rakhna.' Three simple words that carry all the weight of my heart.

title: Coffee and Conversation
body: Talking about our day, the highs and the lows, and finding comfort in every word.

title: The Edited Truth
body: Seeing '<This message was edited>' and knowing there's always more you want to say to me.

title: Ten Minutes of Us
body: Even when time is short, those ten minutes between our schedules are the highlight of my day.

title: Rukooo Moments
body: The playful 'Rukooo rukooo' when we aren't ready to let the conversation end.

title: The Silent 'I'm Here'
body: Sometimes just knowing you're on the other end of the phone is all the peace I need.

title: November Rain
body: Watching the weather change and wishing you were right here beside me to see it.

title: Sorry and Strength
body: Navigating the 'Sorry' moments and coming out stronger on the other side. We always find our way back.

title: The Morning Glow
body: Waking up to your messages is the only way I want to start my mornings.

title: December Warmth
body: In the cold of December, your words are the warmth that keeps me going.

title: A Shared Secret
body: The things only we know, the jokes only we find funny, and the bond only we share.

title: Waiting for You
body: The anticipation of seeing your name pop up on my screen never gets old.

title: Christmas Eve Quiet
body: A quiet night before Christmas, thinking about how much has changed since we started.

title: End of the Year
body: Reflecting on all the chats, the calls, and the memories we built this year.

title: New Year, Same Us
body: Starting 2026 with you is the only resolution I ever needed to make.

title: Winter Whispers
body: Talking late into the night while the world sleeps, feeling like we're the only two people awake.

title: The 'Pitoge' Warning
body: The playful threats that remind me of how comfortable and happy we are together.

title: Simply You
body: There’s no one else I’d rather share my random thoughts and daily updates with.

title: A Random Tuesday
body: Even a boring day becomes special when I get to hear your voice or read your texts.

title: The Deep Conversations
body: Peeling back the layers and talking about the things that truly matter to us.

title: Just Checking In
body: A quick text just to say I'm thinking of you. I hope you're smiling.

title: Shared Dreams
body: Talking about the future and realizing that 'us' is a big part of it.

title: The Comfort of Routine
body: Our daily rhythm has become my favorite song. I never want to miss a beat.

title: Almost February
body: Another month down, and I'm even more grateful for you than I was before.

title: The Black Screen
body: Even when the screen is black and we're just on call, I feel your presence so clearly.

title: Mummy's Presence
body: Hiding our chats and keeping our little world secret. It adds to the thrill of us.

title: Call vs. Chat
body: 'Hum call chat pr baate q kr rhe?' Because I just want to hear you, always.

title: The Raja & SunShine
body: A title for us, a story for us, and a future that belongs only to us.

title: The Unspoken Words
body: The things we don't say out loud but feel in every message we send.

title: The Laughter Lines
body: Thinking about the times you've made me laugh until my stomach hurt.

title: Safe Haven
body: You are the place I go when I need to feel safe and understood.

title: The Little Heart
body: Every '❤️' you send feels like a tiny piece of your heart reaching out to mine.

title: The Way You Say My Name
body: Even in text, I can hear the way you say my name. It’s my favorite sound.

title: Overcoming the Distance
body: Phones and screens can't stop the connection we've built. We're closer than ever.

title: The Morning After
body: Thinking about our late-night talks the moment I wake up. You're my first thought.

title: The Patience of Love
body: Waiting for your reply is never a chore when I know it’s coming from you.

title: The Mirror of Us
body: Seeing myself through your eyes and liking the person I see.

title: Small Victories
body: Celebrating the little wins in our lives together, no matter how small.

title: The Strength in Silence
body: Even when we have nothing to say, being 'with' you is enough.

title: The Endless Chat
body: Our conversation is a book that I never want to finish reading.

title: My SunShine
body: You truly are the light in my day. Thank you for being you.

title: The Raja's Queen
body: Building our own little kingdom, one message at a time.

title: The Breakthrough
body: Today was the day everything changed.  You finally let the walls down and let me in. It wasn't just a conversation; it was the start of 'us' in the truest sense. [cite: 1]

title: Finally Us
body: No more hesitation, no more holding back.  We committed to each other today, and the world feels completely different. [cite: 1]

title: The Promise of October
body: Walking into this new chapter with you.  Today, we decided that whatever comes next, we face it together. [cite: 1]

title: The Beginning of Us
body: From work tasks to this—starting our journey and checking our first domains together. [cite: 1]
